mapper.insert: insert into gowith values(null, #{gowith_title}, #{gowith_content}, #{gowith_writer}, now(), 0, 0, null)
mapper.update: update gowith set gowith_title=#{gowith_title}, gowith_content=#{gowith_content} where gowith_id=#{gowith_id}
mapper.select: select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by gowith_id desc) as num_id, gowith_id, gowith_title, gowith_content, gowith_writer, gowith_created_at, gowith_like, gowith_view, gowith_img from gowith g) g2 where g2.gowith_id = #{gowith_id}

select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by gowith_id desc) as num_id, gowith_id, gowith_title, gowith_content, gowith_writer, gowith_created_at, gowith_like, gowith_view, gowith_img from gowith g) g2 where g2.num_id BETWEEN ${start} and ${end}
